channel.title: Character Login (Rep for fix)
channel.description:
This is so weird, i've been meaning to fix this, i'm not sure if this Client sided or Source sided. If I login with the username Entinity, it will register me as Tinity and in Characters.txt. But if I login with 123Entinity, it will register me as Entinity and in Characters.txt, What the hell...? lol. How can I fix this? PI base.
Regards, James.

item.title: Character Login (Rep for fix)
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Thinking it’s an anti-leech, just search the name in the files.
Either that, if it uses the name entinity, it make’s it into a different name or something, not sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Character Login (Rep for fix)

item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

This is so weird, i’ve been meaning to fix this, i’m not sure if this Client sided or Source sided.
If I login with the username Entinity, it will register me as Tinity and in Characters.txt.
But if I login with 123Entinity, it will register me as Entinity and in Characters.txt, What the hell…? lol.
